update location set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_ind = #{delInd,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from location where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by create_date desc limit 1
